description: This file defines a FastAPI application for a notes management backend, including endpoints for health check, listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, with dependencies on database and schema modules.

methods.name: health_check
methods.description: Health check endpoint to verify the service is running.

methods.name: to_note_out
methods.description: Converts a note domain model to a NoteOut schema.

methods.name: list_notes
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes.

methods.name: get_note
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its UUID.

methods.name: update_note
methods.description: Updates an existing note by its UUID.

methods.name: delete_note
methods.description: Deletes a note by its UUID.
